name: Abjure Enemy
summary: Abjure Enemy is an Oath of Vengeance Action. This ability allows them to Frighten an enemy.
description:
Frightened (Condition)|Frighten an enemy. They'll be easier to hit and cannot move. Fiends and undead have Disadvantage on this Saving Throw

On Save: Target is Slowed instead.

name: Acid Breath
summary: Acid Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a column of damaging acid in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of acid.

name: Arcane Recovery
summary: Arcane Recovery is a Wizard Class Action. This ability allows you to regain half your Wizard level, rounded up, in Spell Slots once per day.
description: Once per day out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.

name: Aura of Courage
summary: Aura of Courage is a Paladin Class Action. This ability allows a Paladin to protect their allies from fear.
description: You and any nearby allies can't be Frightened. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.

name: Aura of Devotion
summary: Aura of Devotion is a Class Feature of Oath of Devotion. This ability allows a Paladin to protect their allies from being Charmed.
description: You and any nearby allies can't be Charmed. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.

name: Bear Companion
summary: Bear Companion is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Blade of Rime
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to use their equivalent of Ice Knife by expending ki|forceplural=yes instead of Spell Slots.
description:
Throw a shard of ice that deals 1d10|Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2d6|Cold to anyone nearby. It leaves an ice surface.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced|Silenced.

name: Blessing of the Trickster
summary: Blessing of the Trickster is a Trickery Domain Action. This ability allows a Cleric to improve the Stealth Checks of an allied creature.
description:
Grant another creature Advantage on Stealth Checks.

Only affects one target at a time.

name: Boar Companion
summary: Boar Companion is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Bolstering Magic: Boon
summary: Bolstering Magic: Boon is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability gives bonuses to Attack Rolls and Ability Checks for up to a minute, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally receive d4|Physical +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls and Ability Checks for 10 turns.

name: Bolstering Magic: Level 1 Spell Slot
summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 1 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability recovers a Level 1 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally recover a Level 1 Spell Slot

name: Bolstering Magic: Level 2 Spell Slot
summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 2 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability recovers a Level 2 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally recover a Level 2 Spell Slot

name: Bolstering Magic: Level 3 Spell Slot
summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 3 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action class action. This ability recovers a Level 3 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally recover a Level 3 Spell Slot

name: Charm Animals and Plants
summary: Charm Animals and Plants is an Action available to Nature Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to reduce the aggressiveness of nearby fauna and flora.
description: Channel fey magic to Charmed|Charm nearby beasts and plants.

name: Chill of the Mountain
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to hit with cold damage and reduce the movement speed of their opponent. This action is the Monk's equivalent of Ray of Frost.
description: Call forth the cold mountain winds and reduce the target's movement speed by ft=10.

name: Cloak of Shadows
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow action that allows you to enter the shadows and disappear from sight.
description:
Wrap yourself in shadows to become Cloak of Shadows|Invisible if you are Obscured.

Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, take an action, or take damage.

name: Control Undead
summary: Control Undead is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to gain control over the undead.
description: Use the power of your Oath to gain control over an undead creature. The undead will follow you around and attack your enemies. The target's level must be lower than yours.

name: Defensive Flourish (Melee)
summary: Defensive Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and increase their own Armour Class if it hits.
description: Attack defensively, increasing your Armour Class by 4 if you hit.

name: Defensive Flourish (Ranged)
summary: Defensive Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to enemies with Ranged Weapons and increase their own Armour Class if it hits.
description: Attack defensively, increasing your Armour Class by 4 if you hit.

name: Dire Raven Companion
summary: Dire Raven Companion is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Divine Strike
summary: Divine Strike is a Weapon Action-like ability available to level 8 Life,  Trickery, Nature, Tempest, and War. Divine Strike deals 1 ~ 8 additional damage upon a weapon strike (either melee or ranged) of a type dependent on the chosen Domain.
description:
* Divine Strike Radiant Melee Icon Melee Skill: Once per turn deal 1d8 {Variation Damage Type} damage in addition to your weapon's {Weapon Damage} {Weapon Type} damage.
* Divine Strike Radiant Ranged Icon Ranged Skill and Reaction: Deal an additional 1d8 {Variation Damage Type} damage.

name: Dreadful Aspect
summary: Dreadful Aspect is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to channel their dark emotions to frighten their enemies.
description: Let your darkest emotions burst forth as a menacing pulse to Frightened|Frighten nearby enemies.

name: Embrace of the Inferno
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to cast Scorching Ray as a class action. Embrace of the Inferno hurls 3 rays of fire at targets within range. You can either target a single creature or multiple creatures with the rays. Each ray rolls a separate Attack Roll and deals Fire damage.

name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to hit an enemy, dealing unarmed damage with 1d10|Fire, and deal an extra 1d4|Fire damage on their next melee attack.
description: Hit foes from afar.  Your next melee attacks deal an additional 1d4|Fire damage.

name: Fey Presence
summary: Fey Presence is an Archfey Action. This ability allows the Warlock to charm or frighten enemies at short range.
description: Charmed|Charm or Frightened|Frighten nearby foes with the feywild's beguiling, disturbing magics.

name: Fiendish Resilience
summary: Fiendish Resilience is a class action unique to the Fiend subclass that lets the Warlock choose a damage type to be resistant to every Short Rest.
description: Choose a damage type and become Resistant to it. You can pick a new damage type each Short Rest. You can only have 1 type of Resistance at a time.

name: Fire Breath (Line)
summary:
Fire Breath is a Brass Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a line of damaging flame in a target direction.

See also: Fire Breath (Cone) for the Gold Dragonborn and Red Dragonborn racial action.
description: Spew forth a column of fire.

name: Fist of Four Thunders
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to push creatures and objects away. It is the Monk equivalent of Thunderwave.
description: Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects.

name: Fist of Unbroken Air
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to punch an enemy at distance, sending them flying backwards..
description: Push the target back m=6|ft=20 and knock it Prone (Condition)|Prone.

name: Flames of the Phoenix
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to cast Fireball as a class action.
description: Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity

name: Frost Breath
summary: Frost Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a cone of damaging cold energy in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of ice.

name: Gong of the Summit
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows Way of the Four Elements to cast a monk version of the spell Shatter.
description: Damages all nearby creatures and objects. Creatures made of inorganic material such as stone have Disadvantage on their SavingThrow.

name: Hide in Plain Sight
summary: Hide in Plain Sight is a Ranger class action that makes you Invisible and gives a +10 bonus to Checks as long as you stand still.
description: Camouflage yourself with your environment to become Invisible and gain a +10 bonus on Stealth Checks, as long as you stand still.

name: Hypnotic Gaze
summary: Hypnotic Gaze is an Enchantment Class Action that attempts to Incapacitate a creature. You can maintain your gaze to keep it going
description:
Charmed|Charm and Incapacitated|Incapacitates a creature. It cannot attack you. It cannot act.

You can Maintain Hypnotic Gaze your Hypnotic Gaze each turn to extend its duration.

name: Improved Divine Smite
summary: Improved Divine Smite is a class action available to Paladins that adds extra damage to all of their weapon strikes. This damage stacks with all other sources.
description:
Your attacks are suffused with divine might. 
Melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8|Radiant damage.

name: Inciting Howl
summary:
Inciting Howl is an action available to Wildhearts with the Rage: Wolf Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to use their wolf-like anger to increase their allies' movement speed.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
description: Each ally within earshot can move an additional 3 m / 10 ft during their next turn.

name: Infiltration Expertise
summary: Infiltration Expertise lets Assassins adopt the identity of a male or female of any humanoid race, though the type is selected the actual appearance is random. It is similar to the spell Disguise Self.
description: Adopt a new identity, changing your appearance.

name: Intimidating Presence
summary: Intimidating Presence is a Berserker Action. This ability allows the Barbarian instill fear into their enemies.
description:
Menace an enemy and instill a terrible Frightened|Fear within them.

You can use Maintain Intimidating Presence to prolong the targets fear.

name: Invoke Duplicity
summary: Invoke Duplicity is a Trickery Domain Action. This ability allows a Cleric to summon an illusory duplicate of themselves that improves the hit chances of allied creatures against nearby enemies.
description: Summon an illusion to distract your enemies. You and your allies receive Advantage on Attack Rolls against a creature if both the attacker and the illusion are within 3m / 10ft of it.

name: Ki Resonation: Punch (Action)
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand action that allows you to punch a target, activating the Ki within them. You can then detonate this Ki to cause an explosion.
description:
Hit a creature with your bare fists, making the ki in its body Resonating Ki|Resonate with yours.

You can then make this ki explode with Ki Resonation: Blast.

name: Lay on Hands
summary: Lay on Hands is a Paladin Action. This ability allows the Paladin to heal a creature or cure it of diseases and poisons.
description:
Use your blessed touch to heal a creature or cure it of all diseases and poisons.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Maintain Intimidating Presence
summary: Maintain Intimidating Presence is a Berserker Action. This ability allows the Barbarian to continue to instill fear into their enemies.
description: Prolong the Frightened|Fear inflicted on a target by your Intimidating Presence

name: Mist Stance
summary: Way of the Four Elements equivalent of the level 3 Wizard spell Gaseous Form that can only target the caster.
description:
Transform into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage.

The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength SavingThrows.

While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.

name: Mobile Flourish (Melee)
summary: Mobile Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to a target with a melee weapon, sending them flying backwards. Afterwards, you can teleport next to them.
description: Thrust your weapon with enough force to push your target back m=6|ft=20. Afterwards, you can Mobile Flourish: Teleport|Teleport to the target.

name: Mobile Flourish (Ranged)
summary: Mobile Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to a target with a ranged weapon, sending them flying backwards. Afterwards, you can teleport next to them.
description: Thrust your weapon with enough force to push your target back m=6|ft=20. Afterwards, you can Mobile Flourish: Teleport|Teleport to the target.

name: Natural Recovery
summary: Natural Recovery is a Spell Slots once per day.
description:
Available only out of combat.

Once per day while out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.

name: Nature's Wrath
summary: Nature's Wrath is an Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows the Paladin to root an enemy in place, leaving their guard open to attacks.
description: Invoke primaeval forces to restrain an enemy.

name: Poison Breath
summary: Poison Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a column of poisonous breath in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of poison.

name: Preserve Life
summary: Preserve Life is an Action available to Life Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to heal their allies.
description:
Evoke a healing energy that restores 3 x Cleric Level|Healing to allied creatures.

Has no effect on undead and constructs.

name: Radiance of the Dawn
summary: Radiance of the Dawn is a Light Domain Action. This ability allows the Cleric to channel divine power and deal Radiant damage to enemies.
description:
Harness the sun's divine power to dispel any magical darkness and deal 2d10 + Character Level|Radiant damage to hostile creatures.

On a successful save, targets still take half damage. Doesn't affect creatures that have total cover from you.

name: Summon Companion
summary: Summon Companion is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Reckless Attack
summary: Reckless Attack is a Barbarian class action that grants them Advantage on attacks but also granting enemies Advantage on attacks against them.
description:
Throw all caution in the wind to gain Advantage on your melee Attack Roll.

Until your next turn, you have Advantage on all Attack Rolls, but enemies also have Advantage on Attack Rolls against you.

name: Rush of the Gale Spirits
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to conjure a squall to clear dangerous gasses or throw creatures back, potentially causing a dangerous fall. This action is the Monk's equivalent of Gust of Wind
description: Summon a strong wind that clears all clouds and pushes creatures back m=5|ft=17, forcing them Off Balance (Condition)|Off Balance.

name: Sacred Weapon
summary: Sacred Weapon is an Oath of Devotion Action. This ability allows them to channel positive energy into their weapon, adding their Charisma Modifier to their attack rolls.
description: Turn your weapon into a Sacred Weapon. It has a higher chance of hitting, and emits a bright light.

name: See Invisibility (Class Action)
summary: See Invisibility is an Illusion class action that lets you see Invisible creatures until Long Rest. The effect is similar to the spell See Invisibility (Spell)|See Invisibility.
description: Glimpse Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

name: Shadow Arts: Darkness
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Action. This ability allows Monks to conjure a cloud of darkness in an area within range that obscures and Blinds those within it.
description: Create a cloud of magical darkness that Heavily Obscured|Heavily Obscures and Blinded|Blinds creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it.

name: Shadow Arts: Darkvision
description: Grant a creature the ability to see in the dark out to a range of m=12|ft=40.

name: Shadow Arts: Pass Without Trace
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Action. This ability allows Monks to grants themselves and nearby allies a bonus to stealth. This action is the Monk's equivalent of the spell Pass Without Trace
description: Call forth a veil of shadow and silence that gives you and nearby allies a +10 bonus to Checks.

name: Shadow Arts: Silence
summary:
PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Action. This ability allows Monks to summon a sphere of absolute quietness in an area within range. Creatures within this sphere are immune to Thunder damage and cannot cast verbal spells.

:For the Level 2 spell, see {{SAI|Silence.}}
description: Create a sound-proof sphere. All within are Immune to Thunder damage.

name: Shadow Strike
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow action that lets you strike from the shadows dealing Psychic damage
description: Teleport to a foe from a hidden position, striking them with the creeping, psychic ferocity of the shadows themselves.

name: Shadow Strike: Unarmed
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow action that lets you strike from the shadows with your fists, dealing Psychic damage.
description: Teleport to a foe from a hidden position, striking them with the creeping, psychic ferocity of the shadows themselves.

name: Shapechanger
summary: Shapechanger is a Transmutation action that allows you to transform into a Blue Jay at will, without expending any spell slots.
description:
Transform into a blue jay, able to Fly (Class Action)|Fly. 

If the blue jay's hit points drop to 0, the target reverts to its original form with its original hit points.

name: Shaping of the Ice
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to create an ice cube that can be climbed.
description: Create a climbable ice cube.

name: Slashing Flourish (Melee)
summary: Slashing Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to two enemies with a melee weapon.
description: Attack up to 2 enemies at once.

name: Slashing Flourish (Ranged)
summary: Slashing Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to two enemies with a ranged weapon.
description: Attack up to 2 enemies at once.

name: Sneak Attack (Melee)
summary:
Sneak Attack (Melee) is a Rogue Action. This ability allows the Rogue to exploit enemies' distraction and deal extra damage to their vulnerable spots with Melee Weapons. 

The weapon has to have the Finesse property (but can still utilize Strength if it is higher than Dexterity).

See also: Sneak Attack (Ranged)
description: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to a foe you have Advantage against. You can also use Sneak Attack if you have an ally within 1.5m / 5ft of the target and you don't have Disadvantage.

name: Sneak Attack (Ranged)
summary:
Sneak Attack (Ranged) is a Rogue Action. This ability allows the Rogue to exploit enemies' distraction and deal extra damage to their vulnerable spots with Ranged Weapons.

See also: Sneak Attack (Melee)
description: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to a foe you have Advantage against. You can also use Sneak Attack if you have an ally within 1.5m / 5ft of the target and you don't have Disadvantage.

name: Song of Rest
summary: Song of Rest is an Action available to the Bard. This ability allows the Bard to restore their allies' strength by granting an additional Short Rest once per day.
description: Use your craft to soothe. You and your allies are revitalized as though you had taken a Short Rest.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to create a sphere that channels different elements. This action is the Monk's equivalent of Chromatic Orb.
description:
Hurl a sphere of energy.

It deals 3d8|Thunder damage, or 2d8 Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Poison damage and creates a surface.

name: Spiteful Suffering
summary: Spiteful Suffering is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to steep their enemies in darkness, causing necrotic damage and leaving them vulnerable to attacks.
description: Steep an enemy in the darkness that churns within you. The target takes 1d4 + Charisma Modifier|Necrotic damage each turn and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage.

name: Stunning Strike (Melee)
summary: Stunning Strike (Melee) is a Monk Action. This Action allows the Monk to deal damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and possibly Stun them.
description: Spend a ki to deal Weapon Damage and possibly Stunned|Stun the target.

name: Stunning Strike (Unarmed)
summary: Stunning Strike (Unarmed) is a Monk Action. This Action allows the Monk to deal damage to enemies with an Unarmed Strike and possibly Stun them.
description: Spend a ki to deal Unarmed Damage and possibly Stunned|Stun the target.

name: Supreme Sneak
summary: Supreme Sneak is a Thief Action. This ability allows the Thieves to become invisible for a limited amount of time.
description: Blend into the environment so completely that you become Invisible.

name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to shoot a flaming cone from their fingertips and deal Fire damage to enemies. This is the Monk's equivalent of Burning Hands.
description: Expel fire from your outstretched hands and ignite anything flammable.

name: Symbiotic Entity
summary:
Symbiotic Entity is a Circle of the Spores Action that consumes one Wild Shape Charge. It grants you temporary hit points, and until they're gone:
* your weapon and unarmed attacks deal additional Necrotic|necrotic damage, and
* you deal double damage with Halo of Spores.
description: Gain Healing|4 Temporary Hit Points per Druid level and deal an additional 1d6|Necrotic damage while you have them. Cast Halo of Spores with double damage.

name: Third Eye: Darkvision
summary: Third Eye: Darkvision is a Divination action that gives you the ability to see in the darkness all the way up to m=27|ft=80 (akin to Superior Darkvision) until the next day.
description: You gain the ability to see in the dark out to a range of m=27|ft=80

name: Third Eye: See Invisibility
summary: Third Eye: See Invisibility is a Divination action that gives you the ability to see invisible creatures nearby until Long Rest. It is akin to the spell See Invisibility.
description: Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

name: Touch of the Storm
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to strike nearby enemies with lightning, causing them to be unable to use reactions. This is the Monk's equivalent of Shocking Grasp.
description: The target cannot use reactions. This spell has Advantage on creatures with metal armour.

name: Turn the Faithless
summary: Turn the Faithless is an Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows the Paladin to make fey and fiends flee from them.
description:
Channel your Oath using ancient words to Turned|Turn nearby fey and fiends.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Turn the Unholy
summary: Turn the Unholy is an Action available to Oath of Devotion. This ability allows these Paladins to make Undead and Fiends(see notes) flee from them.
description:
Turned|Turn nearby fey and fiends. They are forced to flee and cannot come close to you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Turn Undead
summary: As an action, present your holy symbol and cause undead creatures to flee.
description:
Pray to Turn all undead that can see you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Umbral Shroud
summary: Umbral Shroud is a Gloom Stalker Action that lets you become Invisible so long as you are enshrouded in shadows.
description:
Area must be Lightly or Heavily Obscured

Wrap yourself in shadows to become Umbral Shroud (Condition)|Invisible if you are obscured.

Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, take an action, or take damage

name: Unrelenting Ferocity
summary: Unrelenting Ferocity is an action available to Wildheart Barbarians with the Rage: Bear Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to heal themselves while raging.
description:
Muster up your stamina to heal yourself.

Can only be used once per Rage.

name: Water Whip
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows a Way of the Four Elements to either knock a target prone, or pull a target towards them.
description: Possibly pulls a target within 9m toward you or knocks it Prone.

name: Weapon Bond
summary: Weapon Bond is an Eldritch Knight action. This prevents the Fighter's main hand weapon from being disarmed and makes it automatically return to the Fighter when thrown.
description: Ritually bind the weapon in your main hand. The weapon can't be knocked out of your hand, and it automatically returns to you when Thrown.

name: Wholeness of Body
summary: PAGENAME is an action unique to Class Monk Open Hand Hotbar Icon|Way of the Open Hand, a subclass of Monk, that lets the monk regain Ki Points and have an extra bonus action.
description: Regain half your Ki and enter a temporary state of Wholeness of Body (Condition)|Wholeness where you regain Ki Points and have an extra bonus.

name: Wild Shape
summary:
Wild Shape is an Action gained by Druids at Level 2 that allows them to magically transform into various creatures in order to fight in combat or explore the environment.

See also: Combat Wild Shape, the Circle of the Moon enhanced version with extra exclusive forms.
description:
Magically assume the shape of a beast. While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast Spells.

You can take on the attributes your beast form -- excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 Hit Points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wolf Spider Companion
summary: Summon Companion: Wolf Spider is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Action Surge
summary: Action Surge is a Free Action gained by Fighters at Level 2. This ability allows the Fighter to take another action in the same turn.
description:
Available only in combat.

Immediately gain an extra action to use this turn.

name: Bardic Inspiration
summary:
Bardic Inspiration is a Class Feature of a Bard. This ability allows a Bard to inspire their allies and influence the outcome of their rolls. The version at level 5 and onwards is called Improved Bardic Inspiration in the UI. 

See also: The College of Valour enhancement Combat Inspiration
See also: The College of Swords enhancement Blade Flourish
description: Inspire an ally to go beyond their capabilities with your performance. They can add a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical+1d6}} bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.

name: Bend Luck
summary: Bend Luck is a Wild Magic free action and reaction that grants a bonus or penalty to a target's Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.
description: Give a target a {{DieIcon|d4|Physical1d4}} bonus or penalty to an Attack Roll, D20|25 Ability Check, or SavingThrow.

name: Combat Inspiration
summary:
Combat Inspiration is a Class Feature available to College of Valours. This ability is an enhanced version of Bardic Inspiration that adds the ability to increase the target's armour class and damage.

See also: Bardic Inspiration, the base ability available to non-Valour Bards
description: Inspire an ally to add a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical+1d6}} bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, Saving Throw, weapon damage, or Armour Class.

name: Combat Wild Shape
summary: Combat Wild Shape is a Circle of the Moon Druid Bonus Action that allows them to Wild Shape. They gain access to all base Druid Wild Shape forms as well as their own exclusive forms.
description:
As a Bonus Action, you can assume the form of a beast. You can transform twice per Short Rest.

This ability otherwise acts as Wild Shape.

name: Controlled Chaos
summary: Controlled Chaos is a Wild Magic reaction that triggers a Wild Magic effect after a nearby spellcaster casts a Spell
description: Induce a Wild Magic (Subclass Feature)|Wild Magic on the nearby spellcaster.

name: Countercharm
summary: Countercharm is an Action available to Bards. This ability allows a Bard to embolden their allies against Charming and Frightening effects.
description: You and any allies within m=9|ft=30 have Advantage on SavingThrows against being Charmed or Frightened.

name: Create Spell Slot
summary: Create Spell Slot is a Level 2 Sorcerer Bonus Action. This ability allows Sorcerers to channel their innate magic to create spell slots.
description: Spend Sorcery Points to unlock a Spell Slot. The conversion rate is listed in the table below.

name: Cunning Action: Dash
summary: Cunning Action: Dash is a Rogue Bonus Action. This ability allows Rogues to use their bonus action to double their movement speed.
description: Cover more distance this turn: double your movement speed.

name: Cunning Action: Disengage
summary: Cunning Action: Disengage is a Rogue Bonus Action. This ability allows Rogues to use their bonus action to disengage from enemies and avoid opportunity attack.
description: Retreat safely. Moving won't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Cunning Action: Hide
summary: Cunning Action: Hide is a Rogue Bonus Action. This ability allows Rogues to use their Bonus Action to Hide from view.
description: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.

name: Cutting Words
summary: Cutting Words is a Reaction available to the College of Lores. This ability allows these Bards to distract and confuse their foes, potentially causing attacks to miss, or ability checks or saving throws to fail.
description: Use your wit to distract a creature and sap its confidence. It receives a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical-1d6}} penalty to Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.

name: Deflect Missiles
summary: Deflect Missiles is a Reaction gained by Monk at Level 3. Deflect Missiles allows the Monk to reduce incoming damage from ranged weapon attacks and optionally return the projectile.
description: Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + your monk level. If the damage is reduced to 0, you use a Ki Point to Deflect the Missile.

name: Destructive Wrath
summary: Destructive Wrath is a Reaction available to Tempest Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to deal maximum damage when dealing Thunder|Thunder or Lightning|Lightning damage.
description: When you roll Thunder or Lightning damage, you can use your Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage instead.

name: Divine Intervention
summary: Divine Intervention is a Cleric one-time class action that can perform one of several large-scale actions.
description: Call upon your deity in your moment of greatest need. Once they interfere, your deity will never do so again in this manner.

name: Divine Sense
summary: Divine Sense is a Paladin Action. This ability allows them to briefly gain advantage on attacks against certain enemies.
description: Tap into your spiritual awareness to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against celestials, fiends, and undead.

name: Dread Ambusher: Hide
summary: Dread Ambusher: Hide is a Gloom Stalker Bonus Action. This ability allows Gloom Stalkers to use their Bonus Action to Hiding (Condition)|Hide from view.
description: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.

name: Elemental Affinity: Resistance
summary: Elemental Affinity: Resistance is a Resistance to the element matching your Draconic Bloodline
description: When you cast a spell that deals damage matching your draconic ancestry, you can spend a sp|1 to gain Resistance to that damage type.

name: Enraged Throw
summary: Enraged Throw is a Berserker Bonus Action. This ability allows the Berserker to make a ranged attack using nearby items or creatures.
description:
Pick up an item or creature and throw it at a target, dealing additional damage and knocking it Prone.

Your Strength affects the additional damage and how much weight you can throw. Heavier items deal more damage.

The damage of weapons with the thrown property is the same as the weapon's melee damage.

Available only when Frenzied.

name: Entropic Ward
summary: Entropic Ward is a reaction unique to the Great Old One subclass.
description: Impose Disadvantage on an Attack Roll against you. If the attack misses, you gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll against the attacker for 1 turn.

summary: PAGENAME is a bonus that allows the Monk to deal two unarmed strikes at their opponent. This skill does not have to come after an Attack or an action.
description: Punch twice in quick succession.

name: Flurry of Blows: Push
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that enhances your Flurry of Blows to push your target away from you as well.
description: Punch twice in quick succession and potentially push your target m=5|ft=16 away.

name: Flurry of Blows: Stagger
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that enhances your Flurry of Blows to stagger your target as well, preventing reactions as long as it connects.
description: Punch twice in quick succession and Open Hand Technique: Staggered (Condition)|Stagger the target, making it unable to take Reactions.

name: Flurry of Blows: Topple
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that enhances your Flurry of Blows to knock your target prone.
description: Punch twice in quick succession and potentially knock the target Prone (Condition)|Prone.

name: Frenzied Strike
summary:
Frenzied Strike is a Berserker Bonus Action. This ability allows the Berserker to make a melee attack as a bonus action once per turn.

Looking for the Barbarian bonus action? See {{SAI|Rage.}}
description:
As a bonus action, make a melee attack with your equipped weapon.

* Will cause a stack of Frenzied Strain on the barbarian.
* Available only when Frenzied.

name: Frenzy
summary: Frenzy is a Berserker Bonus Action that is a superset of Rage. This ability turns the Berserker's anger into an uncontrollable fury and grants additional abilities in addition to those from Rage. Wearing Heavy Armour triggers the Rage Impeded Condition, removing some benefits of Frenzy.
description:
Available only in combat.

Your Rage turns into a frenzy! You gain Frenzied Strike and Enraged Throw. You can also make an Improvised Melee Weapon (Bonus Action)|Improvised Melee Weapon as a bonus action.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

name: Fungal Infestation
summary: Fungal Infestation is a reaction gained by Circle of the Sporess at Level 6 that allows them to raise a Fungal Zombie from a nearby corpse using a resource exclusive to this action.
description:
Raises a mildewed, mould-encrusted zombie from a corpse.

Target must be a beast or humanoid corpse.

name: Giant Killer
summary: Giant Killer is a Hunter Passive Feature. This ability allows them to make a melee attack and deal damage to large targets using their reaction.
description:
If a Large or bigger creature attacks you, you can use your Reaction to retaliate with a melee attack.

Prerequisite: You must be able to see the creature, and it must be within 1.5m / 5ft of you.

name: Halo of Spores
summary: Halo of Spores is a Circle of the Spores Reaction. It releases spores that deal Necrotic damage to a nearby target.
description: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.

name: Healing Radiance
damage: amounttext:Proficiency Bonus + Paladin Level + Charisma Modifier, type:Healing
summary: Healing Radiance is a Bonus Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows these Paladins to channel their oath to heal allies in an area.
description:
Heal yourself and all nearby allies for Proficiency Bonus + Paladin Level + Charisma Modifier hit points. Regain another Proficiency Bonus + Paladin Level + Charisma Modifier hit points next turn.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Heart of the Storm: Lightning
summary: Heart of the Storm: Lightning is a Storm Sorcery Sorcerer class reaction, part of Heart of the Storm, that creates a storm that deals half your Sorcerer level, rounded down, when you cast a lightning spell.
description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Lightning damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take (Sorcerer Level / 2)|Lightning damage.

name: Heart of the Storm: Thunder
summary: Heart of the Storm: Thunder is a Storm Sorcery Sorcerer class reaction, part of Heart of the Storm, that creates a storm that deals half your Sorcerer level, rounded down, when you cast a thunder spell.
description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Thunder damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take (Sorcerer Level / 2)|Thunder damage.

name: Holy Rebuke
summary: Holy Rebuke is an Action available to Oath of Devotion. This ability allows these Paladins to grant a target a vengeful aura that damages the attacker each time the target is hit in melee.
description: Call upon your Oath to grant a vengeful aura that deals 1d4|Radiant damage to anyone who hits them with a melee attack.

name: Illusory Self
summary: Illusory Self is an Illusion reaction that lets you substitute a duplicate image of yourself when receiving an attack, causing the attacker to miss.
description:
Interpose an illusory duplicate of yourself between you and an attacker's strike, making them miss their attack. 

You must Short Rest to use this feature again.

name: Improved Minor Illusion
summary: Improved Minor Illusion is an Illusion feature that lets you cast Minor Illusion as a bonus.
description:
You can cast Minor Illusion as a bonus action. 

You can remain hidden while casting this spell.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced

name: Inquisitor's Might
summary: Inquisitor's Might is a Bonus Action available to Oath of Vengeance. This ability allows these Paladins to grant a 2 turn single-target buff which causes their or their ally's weapon attacks to deal an additional +Charisma Radiant damage and can Dazed|Daze enemies for 1 turn.
description: You or an ally's weapon attacks deal an additional +Charisma Radiant damage and can Dazed|Daze enemies for 1 turn.

name: Instinctive Charm
summary: Instinctive Charm is an Enchantment reaction that Charms an attacker, redirecting the attack to someone else. If they succeed the WIS, they cannot be affected again until after a Long Rest.
description: Charmed (Condition)|Charm an enemy attacking you. They will attack a new target if possible as a reaction.

name: Ki Resonation: Blast
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand free action that allows you to detonate the ki in anyone resonating with you. The explosion hits the creature and anyone nearby.
description:
Detonate the ki of a creature Resonating Ki|Resonating with you, hitting the creature and anyone within m=5|ft=16 of it.

The resulting explosion causes any nearby creatures Resonating with you to also detonate.

name: Ki Resonation: Punch (Bonus Action)
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that allows you to punch a target, activating the Ki within them. You can then detonate this Ki to cause an explosion.
description:
Hit a creature with your bare fists, making the ki in its body Resonating Ki|Resonate with yours.

You can then make this ki explode with Ki Resonation: Blast.

name: Lunar Mend
summary: Lunar Mend is a Circle of the Moon Bonus Action available while wildshaped. This ability allows the wildshaped Druid to heal themselves.
description:
Expend Spell Slots to regain Hit Points while wild shaped.

You regain 1d8|Healing per Spell Slot level.

name: Magic Awareness
summary: Magic Awareness is a Wild Magic Barbarian Bonus Action. This ability gives bonuses to Saving Throws against spells.
description: Anyone within range adds their Proficiency Bonus to Saving Throws against spells.

name: Misty Escape
summary: Misty Escape is an Archfey passive feature that allows you to become Invisible upon taking damage.
description: Upon taking damage, become Invisible. On your next turn, you can cast Misty Step, though this will break your invisibility.

name: Portent
summary: Portent is a Divination feature that offers you glimpses into the future. You gain two random Portent Dice that you can use as a Reaction to substitute into any Attack Roll or Saving Throw rolled near you.
description:
Your dreams grant you glimpses that let you influence the future.

After each Long Rest, you gain two random Portent Dice. During the day, you can use your reaction to change the die of any Attack Roll or Saving Throw rolled near you to one of your Portent Dice.

Each Portent Die can only be used once, and you lose your unused Portent Dice at the end of the day.

name: Projected Ward
summary: Projected Ward is a reaction feature of the Abjuration. When a nearby ally takes damage, you can use a charge of your Arcane Ward to reduce the damage.
description: When a nearby ally takes damage and you have an active Arcane Ward, you can sacrifice your ward to reduce the damage they take.

name: Rage
summary:
Rage is a Barbarian Bonus Action and Class Feature. Enter a Rage to gain Resistance against physical damage, deal extra melee and thrown damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. Wearing Heavy Armour triggers the Rage Impeded Condition, removing most benefits of Rage.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
description:
Available only in combat.

While Raging, you are stronger, and you deal 2 extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

name: Rage: Bear Heart
summary:
Rage: Bear Heart  is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their bear-like anger to gain resistance against all types of damage (except psychic) and deal extra melee damage to enemies.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
description:
Go into a Rage that makes you tough enough to stand up to any punishment.

You can use Unrelenting Ferocity, and have Resistance to all damage types except psychic damage.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Eagle Heart
summary: Rage: Eagle Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their eagle-like anger to become hard to hit and gain the ability to attack enemies from the sky.
description:
Go into a Rage that makes you near untouchable. You can use Diving Strike.

Foes also have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you, and you can use Dash Bonus Action|Dash as a bonus action.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Elk Heart
summary: Rage: Elk  Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their elk-like anger to increase their movement speed.
description:
Go into a Rage that grants you extraordinary swiftness.

You can use Primal Stampede, and your Movement Speed increases by m=4.5|ft=15.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Tiger Heart
summary: Rage: Tiger  Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their tiger-like anger to increase their jump distance.
description:
Go into a Rage that empowers your leaps.

You can use Tiger's Bloodlust, and your jump distance increases by m=4.5|ft=15.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Wild Magic
summary: Rage: Wild Magic is a Wild Magic Barbarian Bonus Action. When you Rage, it causes a random magical effect to happen.
description: Enter a Rage to gain resistance against physical damage and deal extra melee damage. Barbarians gain Rage at level 1.

name: Rage: Wolf Heart
summary: Rage: Wolf Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their wolf-like anger to aid their allies in combat.
description:
Go into a Rage so inciting it spurs on your allies.

You can use Inciting Howl, and each ally within earshot can move an additional 3m / 10ft during their next turn.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Second Wind
summary: Second Wind is a Fighter Bonus Action. This ability allows them to heal themselves in the midst of battle.
description: Draw on your stamina to protect yourself. You regain 1d10 + Fighter Level|Healing.

name: Shadow Arts: Hide
summary:
PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Bonus Action. This ability allows Monks to use their Bonus Action to Hiding (Condition)|Hide from view.

For the Rogue version of this skill, see Cunning Action: Hide
description: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.

name: Shadow Step
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow bonus that allows you to enter the shadows and reappear at a distant location, granting you Advantage on your next attack.
description:
Teleport from shadow to shadow.

Afterwards, you have Advantage on your next melee Attack Roll.

name: Slow Fall
summary: Slow Fall is a Reaction gained by Monks at Level 4. Slow Fall allows the Monk to gain Resistance to falling damage.
description: When you fall, you can use your reaction to gain Resistance to Falling damage.

name: Storm's Fury
summary: Storm's Fury is a Storm Sorcery reaction that deals damage when hit by a melee attack and pushes the attacker away.
description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you deal (Sorcerer Level)|Lightning damage to the attacker and potentially push them away.

name: Tides of Chaos
summary: Tides of Chaos is a Wild Magic reaction that grants Advantage on your next Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw and increases the chance of a Wild Magic surge afterwards.
description: Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll, D20|25 Wild Magic surge afterwards.

name: Transmuter's Stone
summary: Transmuter's Stone is a Transmutation free action that allows you to create Transmuter's Stones which allow you to give a creature various benefits by holding that stone.
description:
Store some of your transmutation magic in a small stone. A creature carrying the stone gains a benefit of your choice.

Once you have created a stone, you need to cast a Transmutation spell of Level 1 or higher or take a Long Rest before you can create another one.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Acid Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Acid Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by an Acid attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Acid damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Cold Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Cold Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by a Cold attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Cold damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that allows you to create a stone that provides Proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Darkvision
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that allows you to create a stone that provides Darkvision to a range of m=18|ft=60
description: Create a stone that lets the carrier see in the dark out to a range of m=18|ft=60.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Fire Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Fire Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by a Fire attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Fire damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Lightning Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Lightning Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by an Acid attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Lightning damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Speed
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Speed is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that allows you to create a stone that provides increased movement speed.
description: Create a stone that increases the carrier's movement speed by m=3|ft=10.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Thunder Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Thunder Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by an Acid attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Thunder damage.

name: Unstable Backlash
summary: Unstable Backlash is a Wild Magic Barbarian Passive Feature. While raging, receiving damage will trigger the effects of Wild Magic.
description: While Raging, when you take damage or fail a Wild Magic effect that replaces the current one.

name: Vow of Enmity
summary: Vow of Enmity is an Oath of Vengeance Action. This ability allows them to hit their attacks more easily.
description: Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against an enemy.

name: War Priest
summary: War Priest is a War Domain passive that allows the Cleric to attack using a bonus and a War Priest.
description:
When you make an unarmed or weapon attack, you can spend a War Priest to make an additional attack as a bonus.

A War Domain Cleric begins with three War Priest|forceplural=yes per long rest. This increases to:

* Four charges at Cleric Level 5
* Five charges at Cleric Level 8
* Six charges at Cleric Level 11

name: Warding Flare
summary: Warding Flare is a Light Domain Reaction. It allows a Cleric to impose a Disadvantage on an attacker, increasing the chance for the attack to miss.
description: Shield yourself with divine light. Use your reaction to impose Disadvantage on an attacker, possibly causing their attack to miss.

name: Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description:
Take the shape of an Air Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast lightning spells. 

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a Flail of the Vortex that adds +1d8|Lightning to every attack.

name: Wild Shape: Bear
summary: Wild Shape: Bear is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon Druids.
description: Take the shape of a Bear with high Hit Points that can goad enemies into attacking it.

name: Wild Shape: Dire Raven
summary: Wild Shape: Dire Raven is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description: Take the shape of of a Dire Raven that can fly and Blind enemies.

name: Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description:
Take the shape of an Earth Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast earth spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges.

name: Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moons.
description:
Take the shape of a Fire Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast fire spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a +3 Scimitar that adds +1d6|Fire to every attack.

name: Wild Shape: Sabre-Toothed Tiger
summary: Wild Shape: Sabre-Toothed Tiger is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moons.
description: Take the shape of a Sabre-Toothed Tiger that can shred armour and regenerate hit points.

name: Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description:
Take the shape of a Water Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast healing and cold spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a +3 Trident that adds +1d6|Cold to every attack.

name: Create Sorcery Points
summary: Create Sorcery Points is a Level 2 Sorcerer Bonus Action. This ability allows Sorcerers to transform arcane magic into their innate sorcery powers.
description: Spend Spell Slots to gain Sorcery Points. The level of spell slot spent creates the equivalent number in sp|forceplural=yes

name: Divine Smite
summary: Divine Smite allows a Paladin to expend a Spell Slot to deal additional Radiant damage with a melee weapon attack.
description: Your weapon emanates divine might as you strike, dealing an additional 2d8|Radiant|drs=t damage. Deals an additional 1d8|Radiant|drs=t damage to Fiends and Undead.
